rows.label: qst101105_msg001
rows.name: 譲ってもらってトーク(仮)

rows.label: qst101105_msg0001
rows.name: My son... Hol's finally come back!

rows.label: qst101105_msg0002
rows.name:
He says you helped him when he got
attacked by monsters...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0003
rows.name:
And you even helped him
collect the Confusion Ivy!
I can't thank you enough.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0005
rows.name:
There's a type of wood I need
to finish the furniture... It's called
Gulan Walnut.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0006
rows.name:
I was going to send Hol to the
Nopon Camp to fetch it, but...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, his ankle's all swollen,
and the doctor told him to
let it rest for a spell.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0008
rows.name:
I even tried to ask some other folks,
but nobody seems to want anything to
do with those Nopon...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0009
rows.name:
I guess I have no choice but to
close up shop and go myself...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0010
rows.name:
Huh? No, come on, you already
found Hol, I couldn't possibly...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0011
rows.name:
Well... Okay, if you're sure...
Thank you so much for everything.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0012
rows.name:
You'll find the Nopon Camp on
Garanti Plain, in the Waytree.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0013
rows.name:
You'll need to pick up three bits of
Gulan Walnut from a Nopon by
the name of Mokumoku.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0014
rows.name:
Mokumoku knows how to lay his mitts
on good lumber, I'll give him that, but
I wish he wasn't such a conniving little...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0015
rows.name:
*sigh* Never mind.
Just get those materials.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0101
rows.name:
Thanks in advance for picking up the
Gulan Walnut.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0102
rows.name:
Mokumoku should be waiting for you
at the Nopon Camp. That's in the
Waytree on Garanti Plain. Got it?
